name: Core_PixelBuffer_create
signature: Core_Result Core_PixelBuffer_create(Core_PixelBuffer** RETURN, Core_PixelFormat pixelFormat, Core_Natural32 width, Core_Natural32 height);

parameters.name: pixelFormat
parameters.description: The pixel format of the pixel buffer.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width, in pixels, of the pixel buffer. This can be @{code('0')}.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height, in pixels, of the pixel buffer. This can be @{code('0')}.

success: @{code('*RETURN')} was assigned the height, in pixels, of this pixel buffer.
remarks: All pixels are assigned the color black with full opacity
This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
